# Contribute to CSIDS / csverse

The CSIDS welcomes contributions from the R and public health community. You can 

* provide feedback on our R packages;
* file issues;
* improve the documentation and use cases;
* fix a bug by creating a Pull Request

The CSIDS group looks forward to hearing from you!
